## escape\_2 variable

Provides functions escape specific parts in InfluxDB line protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
escape: {
    measurement: (val: string) => string;
    quoted: (val: string) => string;
    tag: (val: string) => string;
}
```
